channel.title: Personal_logs on anihilis ddns
channel.description: Recent content in Personal_logs on anihilis ddns

item.title: Day_06
item.description: Embarrassment How often do you embarrass yourself? I do almost hourly, often I’m embarrassed way before I even begin doing the thing that caused such hard to spell feelings. For me, however, this feeling is often a side-effect of my anxiety. For instance, right now; I’m just sitting here, eating taquitos, writing this post. All I’m think about though, is my partner coming home, and seeing the empty box…. Also it’s the only thing I’ve eaten today.

item.title: Day_05
item.description: Using Solus I’ve been working on the Solus operating system (base kernel of Linux) for several months now (recently returned to Linux and all relevant things along from using a Macbook for a minute), as a laptop system, as well as for my server (boy was that a mistake). I’ve reached that point however, where everything is superbly streamlined, and everything works without error, ever. AND IT’S SO BORING. I’ve always had the issue of being bored of my tech when I’m not messing with it from the most basic levels.

item.title: Day_04
item.description: Work can be a Bitch Goddamn, work is a bitch. During all this COVID bullshit, I have to sell people sex toys like nothing is going on. Everyone wants to feel up the toys, they wanna come in a use our arcades, they wanna come in WITH NO MASK. I don’t care what you think about masks or social distancing, it’s important to respect other’s wishes and personal space. Fuck you if you refuse to wear a mask to prove some bullshit point.

item.title: Day_03
item.description: My Dream for Dystopia I long that one day, we will be free from the confines of a rigged Republic and a suffocating Capitalist regime. No, but like, seriously. I really want all out anarchy. Not Mad Max folley, but like…. Waterworld…. or Willow. Fuck Star Wars though. I would rather suffer in the Sarlack pit than have to deal with that confusing mess. You’re either living in a Dictatorship, or in a society of people with stick-up-your-butt-itis.

item.title: Day_02
item.description: Day two on this blog… My partner is signing up for Medicare right now, and I’m working on my internet security sheet. Her father is in town to help her out, I enjoy the company. With FISA being put to good use in Portland right now, I don’t really feel comfortable going outside right now. I don’t care if I’m a goody two-shoes that doesn’t do anything, I have friends, and there are others out there who are doing very dangerous things.

item.title: Day_01
item.description: AHHHH COVID Holy shit. So now what? It’s almost the end of July, I have friends and family messaging me checking in, as if all of Portland were under complete turmoil. What?? I mean, there’s a lot of protests going on. There’s also a lot of people getting infected, and lots of people dying from both problems. HOWEVER. I’ve been spending all my time inside, due to my partner, needing an intel facility to live in, essentially.
